elements.name: The Deleted Id information in the response body returned from the /api/holidayDelete endpoint should be
elements.description: verified to be the same as the 'id' information in the DELETE request body sent to the /api/holidayDelete endpoint.

steps.name: The api user constructs the base url with the "admin" token.
The api user sets "api/holidayDelete" path parameters
The api user prepares a DELETE request containing the holiday ids to be deleted to send to the api holidayDelete endpoint.
The api user sends the DELETE request and saves the response returned from the api holidayDelete endpoint.
The api user verifies that the Deleted id information in the response body is the same as the id information in the request body.

name: As an administrator, I want to be able to delete holiday information for the specified id number via API connection.
